author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two children drowned in the moat of a ruined fort in Arani on Monday.

Akash (5) son of Kumaravel and Udhayakumar (5) son of Murugan, both students of class-I and residents of Kudukuduppaikarar Nagar in Arani were playing in the street before they mysteriously disappeared on Monday. After a long search they were found battling for life in the moat of the ruined fort nearby. They were rescued and taken to government hospital where they were declared dead.
title: Two boys drown in moat
